description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
title: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR
author: Paul Kalanithi

description: A blogger argues that we should stop striving to be positive at all times and instead become better at handling adversity.
title: THE SUBTLE ART OF NOT GIVING A F*CK
author: Mark Manson

description: Recipes for the Whole30 program of nonprocessed whole foods and no grains, dairy or sugar.
title: THE WHOLE30 COOKBOOK
author: Melissa Hartwig

description: The doctor and talk-show host promotes an eating plan that includes improving "gut health."
title: THE LOSE YOUR BELLY DIET
author: Travis Stork

description: An overview of the history and science of genetics by the Pulitzer Prize-winning author of “The Emperor of All Maladies.”
title: THE GENE
author: Siddhartha Mukherjee

description: Unconventional advice about 50 foods, the symptoms and conditions they can help relieve, and recipes.
title: MEDICAL MEDIUM LIFE-CHANGING FOODS
author: Anthony William

description: A 30-day plan for weight loss that includes recipes for meals and special treats.
title: GREEN SMOOTHIES FOR LIFE
author: J J Smith

description: A 14-day plan for cutting out all sugar and using protein and fiber to slow the absorption of carbohydrates.
title: THE ZERO SUGAR DIET
author: David Zinczenko with Stephen Perrine

description: Beverages of combined leafy greens and fruits are the basis for a weight loss and health plan.
title: 10-DAY GREEN SMOOTHIE CLEANSE
author: J J Smith

description: The surgeon and New Yorker writer considers how doctors fail patients at the end of life and how they can do better.
title: BEING MORTAL
author: Atul Gawande
